suite.name: Login Tests

test.name: Successful Login with Valid Credentials

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Log Message
kw.arg: Test successful login with valid credentials started

kw.name: Get Current Date
kw.doc: Returns current local or UTC time with an optional increment.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: 2023-07-26 00:23:09 - INFO - Test successful login with valid credentials started

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Append To File
kw.doc: Appends the given content to the specified file.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Log Message
kw.arg: Test successful login with valid credentials finished

kw.name: Get Current Date
kw.doc: Returns current local or UTC time with an optional increment.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: 2023-07-26 00:23:10 - INFO - Test successful login with valid credentials finished

test.name: Unsuccessful Login with Whitespace in Username and Password

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Log Message
kw.arg: Test unsuccessful login with leading and trailing whitespaces in username and password started

kw.name: Get Current Date
kw.doc: Returns current local or UTC time with an optional increment.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: 2023-07-26 00:34:48 - INFO - Test unsuccessful login with leading and trailing whitespaces in username and password started

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Append To File
kw.doc: Appends the given content to the specified file.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text ' standard_user ' into text field '//input[@data-test="username"]'.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text ' secret_sauce ' into text field '//input[@data-test="password"]'.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.arg: Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Log Message
kw.arg: Test unsuccessful login with leading and trailing whitespaces in username and password finished

kw.name: Get Current Date
kw.doc: Returns current local or UTC time with an optional increment.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: 2023-07-26 00:34:48 - INFO - Test unsuccessful login with leading and trailing whitespaces in username and password finished

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Append To File
kw.doc: Appends the given content to the specified file.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Run Keywords
kw.doc: Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.

kw.name: Run Keyword If Test Failed
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if the test failed.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Test unsuccessful login with leading and trailing whitespaces in username and password (TC001.12).

suite.doc: A test suite with tests for login functionality.
